price: (yaitu) hari yang tidak berguna bagi orang-orang zalim permintaan maafnya dan bagi merekalah laknat dan bagi merekalah tempat tinggal yang buruk.
arabic: يَوۡمَ لَا يَنفَعُ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ مَعۡذِرَتُهُمۡۖ وَلَهُمُ ٱللَّعۡنَةُ وَلَهُمۡ سُوٓءُ ٱلدَّارِ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yawma lā yanfaʿu al-ẓālimīna maʿdhiratuhum walahumu al-laʿnatu walahum sūu al-dāri
